title: Users
requiredFields: Required fields are marked with an asterisk

tooltip.adminRole: Super user. Has the permissions of all other roles and can promote other administrators.
tooltip.expenseRole: Allows you to view, edit, approve, delete all expenses, as well as create expenses for other users.
tooltip.resourceRole: Allows you to modify and delete other users' resources.
tooltip.userRole: Allows you to create, modify, delete user accounts, as well as modify roles and profile information for these users.
